document_data.mainbody:
Stronk was a fomorian living in the Wormwrithings in the late 15 century DR.
Stronk somehow formed a bond with the purple worms.
Stronk acted as a caretaker for the eggs of purple worms in the area.
Circa 1486 DR, he was killed by an expedition led by some adventurers, whod been hired by Bruenor Battlehammer to investigate the threat of the demon lords, who were in need of a purple worm egg for a rite to banish the demon lords.
